title: Teleport Overview
description:
This dashboard displays a high-level overview of your Teleport cluster. It helps you track key metrics to assess the performance and health of your Teleport services.

For more information, see [our official documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/teleport).

definition.content:
This dashboard provides an overview of your Teleport deployment. You can use this dashboard to:

- Monitor the health of your Teleport Cluster

- Track the performance of different services (Proxy, Auth, SSH, Kubernetes, Database)

Tips and Resources:

- __Please note that some widgets are better viewed when filtered by `host`.__

- [Documentation for Teleport Integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/teleport)
  
- [Teleport Health Monitoring](https://goteleport.com/docs/management/diagnostics/monitoring/)
  
- [Teleport metrics](https://goteleport.com/docs/management/diagnostics/monitoring/)
Monitoring the process state is essential to understand the status of the Teleport process, where the states are defined as follows: 0 - OK, 1 - Recovering, 2 - Degraded, 3 - Starting.
